name: orchestr8
description: Complete autonomous software engineering organization with 72 specialized agents (including automatic code indexing, error tracking, and intelligent query agents), 19 autonomous workflows, enterprise compliance, game development, AI/ML, blockchain/Web3 support, meta-orchestration capabilities, and revolutionary code intelligence database with automatic reconciliation. Features self-extending plugin architecture, multi-stage code review system, and JIT context loading with PostgreSQL + pgvector that reduces token usage by 80-90%. File system is source of truth with transparent database synchronization. Transform Claude Code into a full development team with intelligent context management.
